00028   TinkerXYZ* TinkerXYZ::clone(void) const {
00029     return(new TinkerXYZ(*this));
00030   }

00032   TinkerXYZ TinkerXYZ::copy(void) const {
00033     AtomicGroup grp = this->AtomicGroup::copy();
00034     TinkerXYZ p(grp);
00035     
00036     // Add TinkerXYZ specific member data copies here...
00037     return(p);
00038   }

00041   void TinkerXYZ::read(std::istream& is) {
00042     std::string input;
00043 
00044     // first line is the header, first field is number of atoms
00045     if (!getline(is, input))
00046       throw(std::runtime_error("Failed reading first line of xyz"));
00047     int num_atoms = 0;
00048     if (!(std::stringstream(input) >> num_atoms))
00049       throw(std::runtime_error("TinkerXYZ has malformed header"));
00050 
00051     // Read the lines
00052     for (int i=0; i<num_atoms; i++) {
00053       if (!getline(is, input))
00054         throw(std::runtime_error("Failed reading TinkerXYZ atom line "));
00055       parseAtomRecord(input);
00056     }
00057 
00058   }
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062   void TinkerXYZ::parseAtomRecord(const std::string& s) {
00063 
00064 
00065     gint index;
00066     //std::string segname("");       // Tinker doesn't have segments
00067     //gint resid=1;             // Tinker doesn't have residues
00068     //std::string resname("");       // Tinker doesn't have residues
00069     std::string atomname;  
00070     std::string atomtype;          // Tinker atom types are numbers -- crap!
00071     //greal charge=0.0;
00072     //greal mass=1.0;
00073     //gint atomic_number = 1;
00074 
00075     pAtom pa(new Atom);
00076          
00077     std::stringstream ss(s);
00078 
00079     ss >> index;
00080     pa->id(index);
00081      
00082     ss >> atomname;
00083     pa->name(atomname);
00084 
00085     greal x,y,z;
00086     ss >> x;
00087     ss >> y;
00088     ss >> z;
00089     pa->coords(GCoord(x,y,z));
00090 
00091     ss >> atomtype;
00092 
00093     // Now read in the atoms to which this atom is bonded
00094     int bonded_atom;
00095     while (ss >> bonded_atom)
00096       {
00097         // Probably should verify this value is sane
00098         pa->addBond(bonded_atom); 
00099       }
00100 
00101     // Tinker XYZ files don't have segments or residues, so these
00102     // properties get set to the class defaults by the constructor
00103     //pa->segid(segname);  
00104     //pa->resid(resid);
00105     //pa->resname(resname);
00106 
00107     // TODO: once we support reading Tinker param files, we should set these
00108     // to their correct values
00109     //pa->charge(charge);
00110     //pa->mass(mass);
00111     //pa->atomic_number(atomic_number);
00112 
00113 
00114     append(pa);
00115   }
